author: CBC News
title: Trump suspends funding to WHO pending review
description: U.S. President Donald Trump has suspended funding to the World Health Organization.
content:
U.S. President Donald Trump has suspended funding to the World Health Organization in the middle of the COVID-19 pandemic, pending a review.
Trump, at a White House news conference, said the UN agency had "failed in its basic duty and it must be held account… [+163 chars]
